title: Upload button not working
description: Clicking upload doesn't respond. Nothing happens when I click the upload button in the document explorer.

comments.author: Admin
comments.message: We are looking into it. Can you provide more details about your browser and operating system?

title: Slow loading times
description: The application takes too long to load, especially on the document explorer page with many files.

comments.author: Mike Johnson
comments.message: We've identified the issue and are working on optimizations.

title: Search function not returning results
description: Searching for documents returns no results even when documents clearly match the search term.

comments.author: Emily Davis
comments.message: This has been fixed in the latest update. Please check if the issue persists.

comments.author: Robert Brown
comments.message: Yes, it's working now. Thank you!

title: Mobile view issues
description: The sidebar doesn't collapse properly on mobile devices, overlapping content.

comments.author: Admin
comments.message: This has been addressed in the responsive design update.
